title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3225/84 of 16 November 1984 on the classification of goods falling within subheading 07.02 B of the Common Customs Tariff
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 3225/84
of 16 November 1984
on the classification of goods falling within subheading 07.02 B of the Common Customs Tariff
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Potatoes, sliced or chipped, cooked in fat or oil, frozen, shall fall within Common Customs Tariff subheading:
07.02 Vegetables (whether or not cooked), preserved by freezing:
B. Other.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the 21st day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 16 November 1984.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 14, 21. 1. 1969, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 191, 19. 7. 1984, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 172, 22. 7. 1968, p. 1.
(4) OJ No L 107, 19. 4. 1984, p. 1.
